name: Comet Outlaw
description:
In Comet Outlaw, you play as a daring thief who has stolen a powerful prototype space speed ship. As you race through asteroid fields at breakneck speeds, you must dodge obstacles and outmaneuver the space authorities who are hot on your trail.

-= controls =- 

- Use Arrow keys to control the player's ship and navigate menus;

- Key "E" activates the player's shield and confirms the selection of the menu buttons;
